segments.text: Are you going grocery shopping today ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I am , as a matter of fact . Do you have any special requests ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , please get some white bread , thick cut , some ham , not the processed stuff , some gouda cheese , some galla apples and . . .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Wait . This is sounding like a major list . Why don't you just come with me ?
segments.speaker: S2
